title: Software Engineer
description:
**Job Overview** 




 We are looking for a motivated
 **Software Engineer** 
 who is passionate about building scalable applications and writing clean, efficient code. The ideal candidate should have strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work in a collaborative, fast\\-paced environment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, test, and maintain software applications
* Write clean, reusable, and efficient code following best practices
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers
* Debug and resolve technical issues and performance bottlenecks
* Participate in code reviews and improve system architecture
* Ensure application security, scalability, and reliability
* Maintain proper documentation for development processes



**Required Skills** 



* Proficiency in
 **Java / Python / JavaScript / C\\+\\+** 
 (any one or more)
* Strong understanding of
 **Data Structures \\& Algorithms**
* Knowledge of
 **OOP concepts and design patterns**
* Experience with
 **REST APIs** 
 and backend integration
* Familiarity with
 **Git / Version Control Systems**
* Basic knowledge of
 **Databases** 
 (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)



**Good to Have** 



* Experience with
 **Cloud platforms** 
 (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Exposure to
 **DevOps tools** 
 (CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes)
* Frontend experience with
 **React / Angular / Vue**
* Understanding of Agile/Scrum methodologies



**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor’s degree in
 **Computer Science, Engineering** 
 , or related field
* Relevant internships or project experience is a plus
company_industry: Human Resources Services and Software Development

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About Us:**
 We love going to work and think you should too. Our team is dedicated to trust, customer obsession, agility, and striving to be better everyday. These values serve as the foundation of our culture, guiding our actions and driving us towards excellence. We foster a culture of performance and recognition, allowing us to transform growth as we enable our employees to do the best work of their careers.
   

  

**This position is located in Pune.** 
 You'll be working in a major tech center of Pune, India. Across the globe, our Centers of Energy serve as hubs where we accelerate productivity and collaboration, inspire creativity, and cultivate a culture of connection and celebration. Our teams coordinate their time in Centers of Energy to reflect how they work best.
   

  

 To learn more about life at LogicMonitor, check out our Careers Page.
   

  

**What You'll Do:**
 LogicMonitor® is the AI\\-first hybrid observability platform powering the next generation of digital infrastructure. LogicMonitor delivers complete visibility and actionable intelligence across on\\-premises, cloud, and edge environments. By anticipating issues before they strike, optimizing resources in real time, and enabling faster, smarter decisions, LogicMonitor helps IT and business leaders protect margins, accelerate innovation, and deliver exceptional digital experiences without compromise.
   

  

 Our customers love LogicMonitor's ability to bring cloud and traditional IT together into one view, as seen in minimal churn rates, expansion business, and exciting new customer references. In fact, LogicMonitor has received the highest Net Promoter Score of any IT Infrastructure Management provider. LogicMonitor also boasts high employee satisfaction. We have been certified as a Great Place To Work®, and named one of BuiltIn's Best Places to Work for the seventh year in a row!
   

  

 The Backend Developer on the Engineering team is responsible for the implementation, design, architecture and quality control of business integrations/general development within the customer\\-facing product application and internal tools used by development technical operations. This includes troubleshooting bugs and implementing new features as required in existing backend applications; even building new components as needed. A successful Backend Developer will produce all required functionality in a timely manner and will communicate and work with colleagues to solve problems and improve the systems they work with.
   

  

**Here's a closer look at this key role:**
* Prioritize and plan for deliverables in an iterative development strategy.
* Design, document, code, and test technical solution for new systems or enhancements to existing systems.
* Follow agile software development methodologies for implementation.
* Working with various teams in LogicMonitor to deliver software products that support LogicMonitor's business growth.
* Envision system features and functionalities by analyzing business requirements.
* Troubleshoot and resolve product/application issues for escalated support cases.
* Collaborate with a diverse, distributed development organization. Our development team spans multiple cities in the US and Asia.


**What You'll Need:**
* Bachelors or above degree in computer science or related field
* 3\\+ years of software development experience in commercial or enterprise application
* 2\\+ years of full\\-time experience as a Java developer on Linux platform with familiarity on latest Java development framework and open\\-source tools
* Strong understanding of web application architectures with strong SQL / Database knowledge
* Familiar with AWS services
* Ability to work with a development team and develop strong, reliable, and effective relationships with team members.
* Experience using AI tools to enhance productivity, innovation, or problem\\-solving.


*Click here to read our International Applicant Privacy Notice.*
***LogicMonitor is an Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At LogicMonitor, we believe that innovation thrives when every voice is heard and each individual is empowered to bring their unique perspective. We’re committed to creating a workplace where diversity is celebrated, and all employees feel inspired and supported to contribute their best.*
*For us, equal opportunity means fostering a truly inclusive culture where everyone has the chance to grow and succeed. We don’t just open doors; we invite you to step through and be part of something bigger. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.*
***Notice Regarding Use of AI in Hiring***
*We use artificial intelligence tools to assist with reviewing job applications, such as matching skills and experience to job requirements. These tools support, but do not replace, human review. All hiring decisions are made by our recruiting and hiring teams.* 
*You may opt out of AI processing at any time, and your application will still be reviewed. To opt out, please contact us at opt.out@logicmonitor.com.*
*By submitting your application, you acknowledge this notice.*
 Our goal is to ensure an accessible and inclusive experience for every candidate.
   

  

 If you need a reasonable accommodation during the application or interview process under applicable local law, please submit a request via this Accommodation Request Form.
   

  

 Know your rights: workplace discrimination is illegal. Please click here to review LogicMonitor’s U.S. Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision.

title: Engineer (Traction Power System)
description:
Having experience and depth knowledge in Traction Power System Works.
   

  

 Supervision, Execution, Quality Control, Safety Compliance, Stakeholder Co\\-ordination, Documentation, Testing \\& Pre\\-commissioning, Daily Target achievement, Progress Reporting.
   

  

* Responsible for planning, Execution and monitoring all PSI activities at the project site including outdoor earthing works, indoor earthing works, Erection of PSI steel structures including Tower \\& Beam, Equipment structures, Scott \\& Auto transformer (unloading, erection and oil filtrations), Equipment’s erections, Stringing, cabling and terminations, Panels erections, BOQ preparation for the respective site, and testing activities.

title: Embedded SDE
description:
**Description**
 Amazon is seeking an experienced Anaplan Business Intelligence Engineer II (BIE II) for a role in the Global Finance Solutions (GFS) organization to support Anaplan model building for workforce capacity planning for our GREF Finance stakeholders. This role has high visibility within the organization and will require the candidate to partner with the GREF Finance stakeholders which are present across the globe. The candidate should have a good understanding of AP/AR processes and should be able to develop forecast models to support headcount needs to deliver world class service performance.
   

  

 The ideal candidate must demonstrate strategic thinking, strong ownership, and excellence in cross\\-functional collaboration, while maintaining superior attention to detail and effectively managing multiple priorities. Technical expertise required includes proficiency in Anaplan model designing, SQL, API’s and experience with reporting tools such as Cognos, Amazon QuickSight, Tableau etc. Additionally, the candidate should possess working knowledge of databases and data structures, in order to collaborate with DE/BIE teams. This position offers significant growth potential within our dynamic, global organization and represents an opportunity to make meaningful impact at scale. This position requires a proactive, highly motivated individual who can start from scratch, build models to solve business problems and have the skill and backbone to convey the right message to management, to assist in the strategic allocation of resources around the globe.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Develop and improve forecasting models using data collection, data analysis and statistical tools
* Create optimal capacity plan for Finance Operations business by managing trade\\-offs between Customer Experience and Cost Effectiveness.
* Coordinate with Operations and Finance teams to analyze historical data and demand forecasts and build out headcount planning models for future growth.
* Mitigate capacity risks by managing dependencies across multiple operational teams and sites
* Capacity planning for new business/sites
* Clearly communicate dependencies and manage/track exceptions with Senior Management.
* SQL and dashboard development (Quick Suite/ Tableau) is essential skill for success in this role.
* Knowledge of scripting language e.g. python is preferred.
* Manage the daily, weekly, and monthly reporting of capacity performance in each site via Key Performance Indicators.
* Support local site management and workflow teams to optimize staffing requirements.
* Project management skills are required for success in this role.


 A day in the life
   

  

* Work on critical projects that serve major parts of the business.
* Serve as Team lead for medium and large scale projects.
* Actively participate in strategic initiatives and special projects when assigned or required.
* Lead cross functional systems and process improvement initiatives
* Execute vision and goals for the team or the department.
* Build relationships: Make and keep commitments, seek opportunities to partner with customers, be optimistic, and anticipate needs.


**Basic Qualifications**
* 3\\+ years of analyzing and interpreting data with Redshift, Oracle, NoSQL etc. experience
* Experience with data visualization using Tableau, Quicksight, or similar tools
* Experience with data modeling, warehousing and building ETL pipelines
* Experience in Statistical Analysis packages such as R, SAS and Matlab
* Experience using SQL to pull data from a database or data warehouse and scripting experience (Python) to process data for modeling


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with AWS solutions such as EC2, DynamoDB, S3, and Redshift
* Experience in data mining, ETL, etc. and using databases in a business envir


**Company** 
 \\- ADCI \\- Karnataka
   

  

 Job ID: A3132342

title: Web & Mobile App Developer
description:
****Location****
 Gurgaon (India)
   

  

****Mission****
 Zelestra is a multi\\-national renewable energy company committed to revolutionizing the way we harness and utilize clean energy. We aim to drive innovation in sustainable technologies and shape the future of the energy landscape. To support our mission, we are looking for a highly skilled Business Analyst with a strong background in renewable energy, particularly solar PV and wind operations.
   

  

 We are seeking a highly skilled Web and Mobile App Developer with expertise in designing, developing, and maintaining responsive web and mobile applications. The ideal candidate should have experience with front\\-end and back\\-end technologies, cross\\-platform frameworks, and cloud\\-based services. You will work closely with UI/UX designers, product managers, and backend AI/ML engineers to build seamless, high\\-performance applications.
   

  

 This is an individual contributor role where candidate will need to collaborate with Product, Tech and Business team members.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Web \\& Mobile App Development
+ Design, develop, and maintain scalable web and mobile applications using modern frameworks (React, Angular, Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, etc.).
+ Implement responsive and adaptive UI designs for seamless user experiences.
+ Ensure cross\\-platform compatibility for both iOS and Android.

* Backend Integration \\& API Development
+ Work with backend teams to integrate RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and cloud services (AWS, Firebase, Azure, etc.).
+ Ensure secure authentication (OAuth, JWT, etc.) and data protection best practices.

* Performance Optimization \\& Debugging
+ Optimize app performance for speed, scalability, and responsiveness.
+ Debug and troubleshoot UI, connectivity, and performance issues across devices and platforms.

* Collaboration \\& Deployment
+ Collaborate with designers, QA testers, and product teams to create innovative solutions.
+ Deploy applications on Google Play Store, Apple App Store, and web hosting services.

* Continuous Learning \\& Best Practices
+ Stay up to date with emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends.
+ Implement best coding practices, maintain documentation, and follow Agile methodologies.


**Job Requirements**
**Experience \\& Education**
* Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
* 5\\-8 years of experience in web and mobile app development.


**Technical Skills**
* Frontend: React.js, Angular, Vue.js (for web apps)
* Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Swift (iOS), Kotlin (Android)
* Backend: Node.js, Python (Django/Flask), Firebase, .NET, PHP
* Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase Firestore
* APIs: RESTful APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets
* DevOps \\& Deployment: Docker, AWS, Azure, CI/CD pipelines
* Version Control: Git, GitHub, GitLab


**Soft Skills**
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical thinking.
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills.
* Ability to work in fast\\-paced, agile development environments.
* Strong problem\\-solving and critical\\-thinking abilities.
* Ability to work collaboratively with technical and business teams.


 Interested candidates are invited to apply with their CV via LinkedIn post.
   

  

**What We Offer**
**Zelestra is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds. If you are passionate about renewable energy and have the analytical expertise to drive impactful decisions, we want to hear from you.**

title: UI Developer
description:
Wissen Technology is Hiring for UI Developer
   

  

 About Wissen Technology:
   

  

 At Wissen Technology, we deliver niche, custom\\-built products that solve complex business challenges across industries worldwide. Founded in 2015, our core philosophy is built around a strong product engineering mindset—ensuring every solution is architected and delivered right the first time. Today, Wissen Technology has a global footprint with 2000\\+ employees across offices in the US, UK, UAE, India, and Australia . Our commitment to excellence translates into delivering 2X impact compared to traditional service providers. How do we achieve this? Through a combination of deep domain knowledge, cutting\\-edge technology expertise , and a relentless focus on quality. We don’t just meet expectations—we exceed them by ensuring faster time\\-to\\-market, reduced rework, and greater alignment with client objectives . We have a proven track record of building mission\\-critical systems across industries, including financial services, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, and more. Wissen stands apart through its unique delivery models. Our outcome\\-based projects ensure predictable costs and timelines, while our agile pods provide clients with the flexibility to adapt to their evolving business needs. Wissen leverages its thought leadership and technology prowess to drive superior business outcomes. Our success is powered by top\\-tier t ale nt . Our mission is clear: to be the partner of choice for building world\\-class custom products that deliver exceptional impact—the first time, every time.

title: Validation Specialist
description:

* Knowledge of one or more Protocols: PCIe, LPDDR, SPI, USB, AXI, Lin CAN , ETHERNET, MMI DSI/CSI
* Knowledge of ARM and/or x86 SoC Architecture with internal understanding of complete BOOT Process.
* Strong experience in C programming language and Assembly Language.
* Free\\-RTOS experience
* Networking / Wifi stack in Linux and/or networking stack in FreeRTOS

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 R\\&D Team Lead
   

  

  

  

  

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 In this role, you will have the opportunity to contribute significantly to successful project results in technology, software, product, and/or solution development, as well as associated Intellectual Proper\\-ty (IP). Each day, you will act as the first point of contact in Research and Development for specific product\\-related issues and maintenance. You will also showcase your expertise by identifying, proposing, and implementing innovative solutions.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll help run what runs the world, by taking on meaningful work that drives real impact.
   

  

 The work model for the role is:
   

  

 This role is contributing to the Electrification business in Smart Power at Bangalore, India.
   

  

**You will be mainly accountable for**
* Required active participation/contribution in team discussions.
* Provide technical solutions to in solving business problems.
* Collaborate with the team to understand business needs and requirements.
* Write clean and efficient code to ensure the quality and performance of the software.
* Perform unit testing and debugging of applications. Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers.


**Our Team Dynamics**
 Our teams support each other, collaborate, and never stop learning. Everyone brings something unique, and together we push ideas forward to solve real problems. Being part of our team means your work matters \\- because the progress we make here creates real impact out there.
   

  

  

**Qualifications For The Role**
* You are immersed in R\\&D function for software development
* You have 7 to 12 years of experience in design, build and configure applications to meet business pro\\-cess and application requirements using Angular, Spring Boot, RESTful API development, Micro services and SQL
* Possess an enhanced knowledge of Angular, Spring Boot
* Degree in Computer Science (should be full\\-time)
* You are at ease communicating in English


**More About Us**
 ABB Smart Power is a global technology leader, with products and solutions that make power supplies smart, connected and protected. Its intelligent products and solutions make power more competitive by improving the energy efficiency, productivity and reliability of almost any operation.
   

  

 \\#ABBCareers \\#RunwithABB \\#Runwhatrunstheworld
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Data Engineer
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 1 May 2025
   

  

**Title**
 Data Engineer
   

  

**Job Description**
 A Data Engineer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining large\\-scale data systems and infrastructure. Their primary goal is to ensure that data is properly collected, stored, processed, and retrieved to support business intelligence, analytics, and data\\-driven decision\\-making.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and Develop Data Pipelines: Create data pipelines to extract data from various sources, transform it into a standardized format, and load it into a centralized data repository.
* Build and Maintain Data Infrastructure: Design, implement, and manage data warehouses, data lakes, and other data storage solutions.
* Ensure Data Quality and Integrity: Develop data validation, cleansing, and normalization processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
* Collaborate with Data Analysts and Business Process Owners: Work with data analysts and business process owners to understand their data requirements and provide data support for their projects.
* Optimize Data Systems for Performance: Continuously monitor and optimize data systems for performance, scalability, and reliability.
* Develop and Maintain Data Governance Policies: Create and enforce data governance policies to ensure data security, compliance, and regulatory requirements.


**Experience \\& Skills**
* Hands\\-on experience in implementing, supporting, and administering modern cloud\\-based data solutions (Google BigQuery, AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, Snowflake, etc.).
* Strong programming skills in SQL, Java, and Python.
* Experience in configuring and managing data pipelines using Apache Airflow, Informatica, Talend, SAP BODS or API\\-based extraction.
* Expertise in real\\-time data processing frameworks.
* Strong understanding of Git and CI/CD for automated deployment and version control.
* Experience with Infrastructure\\-as\\-Code tools like Terraform for cloud resource management.
* Good stakeholder management skills to collaborate effectively across teams.
* Solid understanding of SAP ERP data and processes to integrate enterprise data sources.
* Exposure to data visualization and front\\-end tools (Tableau, Looker, etc.).
* Strong command of English with excellent communication skills.

title: Staff Software Engineer - SASE (L4-L7)
description:
We are looking for Senior Development Engineer to be a key player in our fast\\-growing SASE Core Network Group R\\&D Centre in Bangalore, India. You will be building and developing a next\\-generation SASE solution. Dive into the world of microservices, distributed systems, networking, and scalable software design, and leave your mark on cutting\\-edge developments impacting millions of users and organizations.
 



  





 We are looking for a proactive, fast learner, innovative engineer who is ready to revolutionize the industry.
 



  





**About Us** 




  





 Check Point is a key player the network security field, striving to provide the leading SASE platform in the market. Our innovative approach, merging cloud and on\\-device protection, redefines how businesses connect in the era of cloud and remote work.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  




* Writing scalable, robust, testable, efficient, and easily maintainable code and services that are part of our Core Network as a Service components
* Develop advanced services of cloud network solutions
* Maintain high\\-performing, scalable, and testable code
* Practice peer review and collaborative programming
* Work with a diverse multicultural team in an agile environment



  





**Qualifications** 



* BE/ME in CS/CE or similar field, with a minimum of 15\\+years of software development experience
* Proficient in C\\+\\+, C, GO programming and debugging
* Experienced in Unix/Linux systems with proficiency in user\\-space processes, kernel, socket programming, inter\\-process communication
* Experience with networking (TCP/IP, IPsec, WireGuard, mTLS , OpenVPN ), routing protocols (OSPF, BGP), tunnelling etc. is a must
* Experience in next\\-gen firewalls, UTMs or IDS/IPS
* Strong verbal and written communication skills. Able to communicate in an open, transparent and consistent manner with team and co\\-workers.
* Innovative and out\\-of\\-the box thinking to foster original ideas.
* Experience with architecture and design of distributed services/microservices / scalable solutions is a big advantage
* Experience in a cloud environment is an advantage \\- Kafa, Kubernetes, DigitalOcean, HashiCorp’s Vault,Nomad, Consul etc
* Experience with NoSQL databases is an advantage
* DevOps mentality is a big plus

title: Fenergo Developer
description:
ISG
   

  

 Fenergo Developer
   

  

**FenX (Fenergo Client Lifecycle Management Platform)**
**Core Responsibilities**
* Configure and customize FenX platform for CLM, KYC, and AML processes.
* Develop workflows, rules, UI components, and data models within FenX.
* Collaborate with business analysts and architects for solution design and impact analysis.
* Support system enhancements, defect resolution, and change requests.
* Participate in Agile delivery cycles and ensure compliance with regulatory standards.


**Required Skills**
* 5\\+ years of experience in Fenergo implementations, with strong FenX expertise
* Hands\\-on experience with XML, XSLT, JavaScript, JSON; RESTful API integration.
* Familiarity with SQL for data analysis and troubleshooting.
* Understanding of CLM, KYC, AML processes in banking.
* Exposure to DevOps tools (Jenkins, GIT, Azure DevOps).


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Experience in Agile environments and stakeholder management.
* Fenergo certification is a plus.

title: Technology Lead / Principal Engineer - SASE (L4-L7)
description:
We are looking for Technology Leader to be a key player in our fast\\-growing SASE Core Network Group R\\&D Centre in Bangalore, India. You will be architecting and developing a next\\-generation SASE solution. Dive into the world of microservices, distributed systems, networking, and scalable software design, and leave your mark on cutting\\-edge developments impacting millions of users and organizations.
 



  





 We are looking for a proactive, fast learner, innovative engineer who is ready to revolutionize the industry.
 



  





**About Us** 




  





 Check Point is a key player the network security field, striving to provide the leading SASE platform in the market. Our innovative approach, merging cloud and on\\-device protection, redefines how businesses connect in the era of cloud and remote work.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  




* Writing scalable, robust, testable, efficient, and easily maintainable code and services that are part of our Core Network as a Service components
* Develop advanced services of cloud network solutions
* Maintain high\\-performing, scalable, and testable code
* Practice peer review and collaborative programming
* Work with a diverse multicultural team in an agile environment



  





**Qualifications** 



* BE/ME in CS/CE or similar field, with a minimum of 20\\+ years of software development experience
* Proficient in C\\+\\+, C, GO programming and debugging
* Experienced in Unix/Linux systems with proficiency in user\\-space processes, kernel, socket programming, inter\\-process communication
* Experience with networking (TCP/IP, IPsec, WireGuard, mTLS , OpenVPN ), routing protocols (OSPF, BGP), tunnelling etc. is a must
* Experience in next\\-gen firewalls, UTMs or IDS/IPS
* Strong verbal and written communication skills. Able to communicate in an open, transparent and consistent manner with team and co\\-workers.
* Innovative and out\\-of\\-the box thinking to foster original ideas.
* Experience with architecture and design of distributed services/microservices / scalable solutions is a big advantage
* Experience in a cloud environment is an advantage \\- Kafa, Kubernetes, DigitalOcean, HashiCorp’s Vault,Nomad, Consul etc
* Experience with NoSQL databases is an advantage
* DevOps mentality is a big plus

title: Principal Automation Test Engineer
description:
**Business Unit:**
 Cubic Transportation Systems
   

  

**Company Details:**
 When you join Cubic, you become part of a company that creates and delivers technology solutions in transportation to make people’s lives easier by simplifying their daily journeys, and defense capabilities to help promote mission success and safety for those who serve their nation. Led by our talented teams around the world, Cubic is committed to solving global issues through innovation and service to our customers and partners.
   

  

 We have a top\\-tier portfolio of businesses, including Cubic Transportation Systems (CTS) and Cubic Defense (CD). Explore more on Cubic.com.
   

  

**Job Details:**
**Job Summary:** 
 We are looking for a visionary and hands\\-on Principal SDET to lead our test automation strategy and elevate our product quality to the next level. In this pivotal role, you will architect and build robust, scalable automation frameworks from the ground up. You will not only solve complex technical challenges but also mentor a talented team of engineers, shaping the future of quality engineering across multiple agile teams. If you are passionate about building world\\-class automation and driving a culture of quality, this is the perfect opportunity for you.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Architect \\& Strategize: Lead the definition and implementation of our end\\-to\\-end test automation strategy, frameworks, and best practices.
* Framework Development: Architect, build, and maintain scalable and reusable automation frameworks for Mobile (iOS/Android), Web UI, API, and backend systems.
* Technical Leadership \\& Mentorship: Provide technical guidance and mentorship to QA engineers, fostering a culture of automation excellence and continuous improvement.
* Tool \\& Technology Evaluation: Actively research and recommend new tools, technologies, and processes to evolve and enhance our testing capabilities.
* Drive CI/CD/CT: Champion Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery, and Continuous Testing (CI/CD/CT) initiatives, ensuring automation is seamlessly integrated into our DevOps pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps).
* Cross\\-Functional Collaboration: Partner closely with developers, DevOps engineers, and product managers to ensure comprehensive test coverage and advocate for testability from the start of the development lifecycle.
* Quality Metrics \\& Reporting: Develop and analyze key quality metrics to provide meaningful reports on automation effectiveness, test coverage, and overall product quality.
* Problem Solving: Tackle complex technical challenges, identify gaps in test coverage, and engineer innovative solutions to improve our quality gates.


**Qualifications \\& Experience (Must\\-Haves):**
* Education: Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science Engineering, or a related technical field.
* Experience: 10\\+ years in software test automation, with demonstrated experience in a senior or lead SDET capacity.
* Programming Expertise: Expert\\-level programming skills in at least one object\\-oriented language (Java or Python preferred) and proficiency in a scripting language (JavaScript).
* Framework Architecture: Proven experience designing, building, and maintaining automation frameworks from scratch.
* Tool Proficiency: Deep, hands\\-on expertise with a variety of modern automation tools:
* UI/Mobile: Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, or Appium.
* API: REST Assured, Postman, or similar.
* Testing Frameworks: Pytest,TestNG, JUnit etc.
* CI/CD Mastery: Solid experience integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, GitLab, or Azure DevOps.
* Communication \\& Leadership: Exceptional communication, leadership, and analytical skills, with a proven ability to solve complex problems.


**Bonus Points (Nice\\-to\\-Haves):**
* Generative AI: Experience with GenAI/ML tools for testing (e.g., GitHub Copilot) is a significant plus.
* Performance Engineering: Experience with performance and load testing tools (e.g., JMeter, Gatling).
* Cloud Technologies: Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Security Testing: Exposure to basic security testing concepts and tools (e.g., OWASP ZAP).
* Certifications: ISTQB or related certifications are a plus.


**Worker Type:**
 Employee

title: Software Engineer III - Java AWS
description:
**Job Description**
 We have an exciting and rewarding opportunity for you to take your software engineering career to the next level.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer III at JPMorganChase within the Consumer and Community Banking, you serve as a seasoned member of an agile team to design and deliver trusted market\\-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. You are responsible for carrying out critical technology solutions across multiple technical areas within various business functions in support of the firm’s business objectives.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Executes software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshooting with ability to think beyond routine or conventional approaches to build solutions or break down technical problems
* Creates secure and high\\-quality production code and maintains algorithms that run synchronously with appropriate systems
* Produces architecture and design artifacts for complex applications while being accountable for ensuring design constraints are met by software code development
* Gathers, analyzes, synthesizes, and develops visualizations and reporting from large, diverse data sets in service of continuous improvement of software applications and systems

title: Software Engineer III - Python, Terraform, AWS
description:
**Job Description**
 We have an exciting and rewarding opportunity for you to take your software engineering career to the next level.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer III at JPMorgan Chase within the Asset \\& Wealth Management, you serve as a seasoned member of an agile team to design and deliver trusted market\\-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. You are responsible for carrying out critical technology solutions across multiple technical areas within various business functions in support of the firm’s business objectives.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Designs and implement Python services, APIs, and tooling to improve CI/CD and deployment workflows on AWS
* Develops scalable microservices and batch jobs using AWS services; follow networking, identity, and security best practices
* Authors and maintain Infrastructure as Code with Terraform (modules, state, environments); contribute to automation for plan/apply. Builds integrations with enterprise systems and AWS services in Python; contribute reusable SDKs, CLI tools, templates, and libraries
* Implements policy\\-as\\-code, audit logging, and compliance controls; apply RBAC and secure secrets handling in applications and infrastructure. Configures deployment strategies (canary, blue/green), rollbacks, approvals, and gates within CI/CD pipelines using AWS\\-native tools
* Writes and maintain automated tests (unit, integration, contract) with Python frameworks; support test data management and quality gates
* Adds observability with logging, metrics, tracing, and alerts; help define and meet SLOs. Contributes to performance tuning and cost optimization across compute, storage, and networking
* Participates in code reviews; collaborate with product, platform, security, and SRE teams
* Supports roadmap delivery, estimation, and risk management; help reduce technical debt and manage dependencies
* Experiences with API Gateway, containers or serverless, Terraform Cloud/Enterprise, and AWS security best practices


**Required Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Formal training or certification on software engineering concepts and 3\\+ years applied experience
* Strong experience with CI/CD platforms. Proficiency in one or more: Python, Java/Kotlin, Node.js/TypeScript
* In\\-depth experience designing, deploying, and managing solutions on AWS, including VPC, IAM, EC2, S3, Lambda, and networking/security best practices
* Hands\\-on expertise with infrastructure\\-as\\-code using Terraform for provisioning and managing cloud resources. Proficient in containerization with Docker, including building, optimizing, and securing container images
* Strong background in orchestrating and scaling workloads using Kubernetes RBAC, and cluster management
* Familiarity with multi\\-cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP) and integrating cloud\\-native services into CI/CD pipelines. Expertise in pipeline design, deployment strategies, and release governance in regulated environments
* Security\\-first mindset: secrets management, RBAC, OIDC/SAML, compliance, audit, and policy\\-as\\-code (OPA)
* Observability: logs, metrics, tracing (Datadog, Splunk, Prometheus, OpenTelemetry)
* Strong architectural design, documentation, and stakeholder communication skills


**Preferred Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills**
* Strong programming skills (Python, Java, JavaScript)
* Experience with AWS and Terraform
* Solid understanding of DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 7 December 2025
   

  

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital – OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Master’s degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.

title: Applied AI T
description:
Applied AI Technologist
 

  





**Ministry of ICT \\& Innovation (MINICT)** 




**Location:** 

 Kigali, Rwanda
 




**Engagement Type:** 

 Full\\-time, Embedded Expert (Deputed) 
 





 It will be a contractual position.
 




  





 1\\. Background
 


 The Ministry of ICT \\& Innovation (MINICT) is strengthening its Responsible AI Office (RAIO) under the Innovation and Emerging Technologies Department, which leads the responsible deployment and scaling of Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions across the public sector. This will enable responsible and sustainable AI adoption in collaboration with government entities, academia, and industry.
 





 To support this initiative, Wadhwani AI Global will deploy a full\\-time Technical AI Expert, embedded within MINICT, to provide hands\\-on technical leadership for applied AI use cases and to support long\\-term technical capacity building within government.
 




  





 2\\. Role Overview
 


 The Applied AI Technologist will support MINICT’s AI Squad team and line ministries in translating priority public\\-sector challenges into practical, scalable AI solutions. The role will focus on technical design, solution evaluation, implementation, advisory, and capacity building, ensuring that AI initiatives are technically sound, responsible, and sustainable.
 





 This role requires strong experience in applied AI and data systems, combined with the ability to work within public\\-sector constraints and collaborate closely with non\\-technical stakeholders.
 




  





 3\\. Key Responsibilities
 

 A. Applied AI Solution Design \\& Advisory
 
* Provide technical advisory support to line ministries on AI design, deployment, and scaling
* Define the technical architecture of pilot projects and pathways for system\\-level adoption



  





 B. Public\\-Sector AI Implementation Support
 
* Support the end\\-to\\-end AI lifecycle for public\\-sector use cases, including:
* Problem framing and requirements definition
* Data readiness and data strategy
* Model selection, fine\\-tuning, training,  and evaluation
* Building and optimizing ML pipelines (ETL, preprocessing, feature engineering)
* MLOps: CI/CD, containerization, model serving, GPU optimization, and monitoring.
* Continuous monitoring framework and improvement of models.
* Ensure AI solutions are feasible within existing institutional, data, and infrastructure constraints



  





 C. Technical Evaluation \\& Partner Assessment
 
* Evaluate the technical capabilities of startups, vendors, and implementation partners
* Support due diligence for AI pilots
* Advise on the scalability, robustness, and sustainability of proposed AI solutions



  





 D. Responsible AI \\& Technical Best Practices
 
* Support integration of responsible AI principles, including fairness, transparency, safety, and explainability
* Advise on technical standards for AI deployment within government systems
* Review and optimize production\\-grade code, following best practices in software engineering
* Promote best practices in data governance, model evaluation, and system monitoring



  





 E. Capacity Building \\& Technical Mentorship
 
* Ensure to build systems within Government to strengthen the technical capabilities of AI use case design and deployments.
* Knowledge transfer to government technologists, local developers, and young professionals
* Support hands\\-on learning through live AI projects within ministries
* Contribute to curriculum design and technical content for AI skilling initiatives



  





 4\\. Qualifications \\& Experience
 

 Education
 
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Engineering, or a related technical field



  





 Experience
 
* 10\\+ years of professional experience in building, deploying, or managing AI/ML systems
* Demonstrated experience working on real\\-world AI applications, preferably in public\\-sector, social\\-impact, or large\\-scale environments
* Experience engaging with multiple stakeholders, including government or institutional partners



  





 Core Skills \\& Competencies
 
* Strong hands\\-on understanding of:
* Machine learning and applied AI systems
* Data pipelines, model evaluation, and deployment considerations
* Ability to explain complex technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders
* Experience mentoring teams and supporting technical capacity building
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills



  





 Desirable Experience
 
* Prior experience working in emerging markets or low\\-resource environments
* Exposure to AI applications in health, education, agriculture, or public service delivery
* Familiarity with open\\-source AI tools and platforms
* Exposure to responsible AI, AI ethics, or governance\\-related technical practices



  





 5\\. Reporting \\& Collaboration
 
* The role will function embedded within MINICT, working closely with Ministry teams
* Will collaborate with line ministries, ecosystem partners, and technical experts
* Will support documentation, reporting, and technical reviews





 ﻿
 





 6\\. Expected Outcomes (Indicative)
 
* Technically validated pipeline of public\\-sector AI use cases
* Well\\-designed AI pilots with clear pathways to scale
* Improved technical capacity within ministries and the local ecosystem
* Adoption of responsible and sustainable AI practices in public systems

title: Base24 Classic Developers
description:
Cognizant Hiring Base24 Classic Developers!!!
   

  

 Location: Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad.
   

  

 Experience: 5 to 15 yrs.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 We are looking for an experienced BASe24 Classic Developer to join our ISG core banking technology team.
   

  

 The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in POS ATM and Teller products and hands\\-on experience with BASe24 modules such as DH SPDH AUTH RTAU HISO and transaction processing for Mastercard VISA and BNET.
   

  

 This role demands strong technical skills in TAL TALC COBOL85 Screen COBOL and Enscribe database along with a solid understanding of ISO\\-8583 and native message formats.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Key Responsibilities Develop maintain and enhance applications of BASe24 Classic on Tandem NonStop systems.
   

  

 Work on transaction processing modules including DH SPDH AUTH RTAU HISO and integrations with Mastercard VISA BNET.
   

  

 Design and implement solutions using TAL TALC COBOL85 and Screen COBOL.
   

  

 Manage data operations using Enscribe database. Analyze and troubleshoot issues using EMS Inspect PATHCOM and NCPCOM tools. Ensure seamless processing of financial transactions across POS ATM and Teller channels.
   

  

 Interpret and implement message formats including ISO\\-8583 HPDH VISA and Mastercard native formats.
   

  

 Collaborate with QA DevOps and business teams to ensure high\\-quality deliverables.
   

  

 Participate in performance tuning code reviews and production support.
   

  

 Required Skills \\& Qualifications Minimum 4 years of experience in BASe24 Classic development.
   

  

 Strong programming skills in TAL TALC COBOL85 and Screen COBOL.
   

  

 Experience with Enscribe database and Tandem NonStop systems. Proficiency in tools like EMS Inspect PATHCOM and NCPCOM.
   

  

 Deep understanding of POS ATM and Teller systems.
   

  

 Hands\\-on experience with DH SPDH AUTH RTAU HISO modules.
   

  

 Familiarity with Mastercard VISA BNET transaction flows.
   

  

 Strong knowledge of ISO\\-8583 HPDH and other native message formats.
   

  

 Excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills.
   

  

 Preferred Qualifications Experience in financial transaction switching and card authorization systems.
   

  

 Exposure to BASe24 migration or modernization projects. Understanding of compliance and security standards in banking applications.
